name: Faris Alwzinani
content: Dr Faris Alwzinani | Introduction | Brunel University London Skip to Content Home People Dr Faris Alwzinani Dr Faris AlwzinaniLecturer (Education) - Computer Science Wilfred Brown Building 111 Email: faris.alwzinani@brunel.ac.uk Tel: +44 (0)1895 268284 Computer Science College of Engineering, Design and Physical Sciences Summary Dr. Faris Alwzinani is a Lecturer (Assistant Professor) in the Computer Science Department at Brunel University London, where he also earned his MSc and PhD in Information Systems. He leads the Digital Innovation and Strategy module and has extensive experience teaching a variety of undergraduate and postgraduate courses. His research focuses on digital transformation and the application of digital technologies in areas such as healthcare and smart cities. Qualifications PhD in Information Systems MSc in Information Systems Management BSc in Information Studies Fellow member of the Higher Education Academy (FHEA) Postgraduate Certificate in Academic Practice (PgCAP) Responsibility Coordinator of the Brunel Pathway College Member of the Admission Team in the Computer Science department
